text: @JudgeJeanine I’m going to go see my kids their spouses and my 10 grandkids.  See today I was making dinner for my oldest son and his family He’s a policeman, he had to call me and tell he was exposed to the coronavirus on Wednesday.  He took the test and he tested negative.  1/2
